You were talking about a stray demon, right?"},{"lineNumber":46856,"originalJapaneseLine":"　普通の悪魔とどう違うんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":" How is it different from a normal demon?\""},{"lineNumber":46857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……大きい所では、変わらないわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...In the main points, not much difference."},{"lineNumber":46858,"originalJapaneseLine":"　普通の悪魔は、刈り取った魂を悪魔界の上司に","translatedEnglishLine":" Normal demons harvest souls and submit them to their superiors in the demon world,"},{"lineNumber":46859,"originalJapaneseLine":"　提出して、階級を上げて力を増すんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":" raising their rank and increasing power, but...\""},{"lineNumber":46860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんふん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":46861,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハグレ悪魔は、契約して取った魂を、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stray demons, on the other hand, take souls from contracts,"},{"lineNumber":46862,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのまま吸い取って自分の力にするの。","translatedEnglishLine":" immediately absorb them and turn them into their own power."},{"lineNumber":46863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　独立採算で、勝手にやってるって事」","translatedEnglishLine":" They operate independently, doing as they please.\""},{"lineNumber":46864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんか、その方が簡単そうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Somehow, that sounds easier.\""},{"lineNumber":46865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魂を力に変換する事自体、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The act of converting souls into power itself,"},{"lineNumber":46866,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰でもできる訳じゃないの。","translatedEnglishLine":" isn’t something just anyone can do."},{"lineNumber":46867,"originalJapaneseLine":"　上級悪魔じゃないと、ハグレにはなれないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":" Only high-ranking demons can become strays.\""},{"lineNumber":46868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん……お前は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... how about you?\""},{"lineNumber":46869,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無理よ。そんな力はないし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Impossible. I don’t have that kind of power..."},{"lineNumber":46870,"originalJapaneseLine":"　階級も、もうすっかり……だもの」","translatedEnglishLine":" And my rank is already completely... gone.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （うふふふ……すっかり、今死ぬかどうかに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Ufufufu... completely fixated on whether I'll die now or not

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意識がいってるね……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my consciousness is focused on that...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （魂さえ頂いてしまえば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (As soon as I take your soul,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらのものだからねぇ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it will be mine...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （頂いたら、お望み通り……『戦って』あげよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Once I've taken it, as you wish... I'll 'fight' you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠間から、炎の矢でも一発撃ち込んでやるよ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From a distance, I'll shoot a single flaming arrow at you.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテは表情の見えない顔の奥で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zakarite, behind a face without expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傲然と嘲笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sneered arrogantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その視線の向こう側には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beyond that gaze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配げにマジックを見る、少女の姿があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a girl looking at Magic with concern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代ゼス王、パセリ・リグ・ゼス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first king of Zeth, Paseri Lig Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その魂の所有者にしか見えない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only visible to the owner of that soul,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの犠牲となった少女の、なれの果てだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was the wretched remains of the girl who became Zakarite's sacrifice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （だめ……その契約を、結んではっ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No... don’t make that contract...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉体があった頃の癖で、もどかしげに喉を押さえる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Out of habit from when she had a body, she frustratingly pressed her throat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、どうやっても声は出ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no matter what, no voice came out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉体を持つ者に聞こえる声は、出せない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She could not produce a voice audible to those with bodies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ふふーーーふふふ……パセリ…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Fufu—fufufu... Paseri...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに仲間が増えるよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soon you’ll have more comrades...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 尻を並べて、たっぷり可愛がってやるよ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll line up side by side and lavishly spoil them...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねっとりとした思念をぶつけられて、身を竦ませ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hit by the slimy thoughts, she shrunk back...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パセリは、苦悩する子孫を悲しげに見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paseri looked sorrowfully at her suffering descendants.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、けっこう来たはずだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, we should have come quite a way by now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいちびっ子。まだ先は長いのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey kiddo. Is it still a long way to go?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そろそろ着く。準備しておくがよい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...We're nearly there. Be prepared."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「準備？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Preparation?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……ランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックさんの契約って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About Magic-san's contract,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやって破棄すればいいんでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how should we go about breaking it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ。そんな事も分からんのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. You don’t even know that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……知らないんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You don't know, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Noisy!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリス！　カモンフェリスーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis! Come on, Felis!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしたの、っとと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong, whoa..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出番だ、着いてこい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s your turn. Follow me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスは低い天井すれすれを飛んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis flew just below the low ceiling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに追随してきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: following Rance closely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「急いでるみたいだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You seem to be in a hurry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日の悪魔の話？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this about the demon from yesterday?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ。ハグレ悪魔とか言ってたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. You were talking about a stray demon, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の悪魔とどう違うんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How is it different from a normal demon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……大きい所では、変わらないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...In the main points, not much difference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の悪魔は、刈り取った魂を悪魔界の上司に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Normal demons harvest souls and submit them to their superiors in the demon world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 提出して、階級を上げて力を増すんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: raising their rank and increasing power, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんふん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm hmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハグレ悪魔は、契約して取った魂を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stray demons, on the other hand, take souls from contracts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま吸い取って自分の力にするの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately absorb them and turn them into their own power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 独立採算で、勝手にやってるって事」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They operate independently, doing as they please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんか、その方が簡単そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Somehow, that sounds easier."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魂を力に変換する事自体、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The act of converting souls into power itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰でもできる訳じゃないの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn’t something just anyone can do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上級悪魔じゃないと、ハグレにはなれないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only high-ranking demons can become strays."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん……お前は？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... how about you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理よ。そんな力はないし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Impossible. I don’t have that kind of power...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 階級も、もうすっかり……だもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And my rank is already completely... gone."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Ufufufu... completely fixated on whether I'll die now or not

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意識がいってるね……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my consciousness is focused on that...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （魂さえ頂いてしまえば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (As soon as I take your soul,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらのものだからねぇ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it will be mine...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （頂いたら、お望み通り……『戦って』あげよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Once I've taken it, as you wish... I'll 'fight' you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠間から、炎の矢でも一発撃ち込んでやるよ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From a distance, I'll shoot a single flaming arrow at you.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテは表情の見えない顔の奥で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zakarite, behind a face without expression,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傲然と嘲笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sneered arrogantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その視線の向こう側には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beyond that gaze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配げにマジックを見る、少女の姿があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a girl looking at Magic with concern.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初代ゼス王、パセリ・リグ・ゼス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first king of Zeth, Paseri Lig Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その魂の所有者にしか見えない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only visible to the owner of that soul,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテの犠牲となった少女の、なれの果てだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was the wretched remains of the girl who became Zakarite's sacrifice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （だめ……その契約を、結んではっ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No... don’t make that contract...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉体があった頃の癖で、もどかしげに喉を押さえる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Out of habit from when she had a body, she frustratingly pressed her throat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、どうやっても声は出ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no matter what, no voice came out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉体を持つ者に聞こえる声は、出せない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She could not produce a voice audible to those with bodies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ふふーーーふふふ……パセリ…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Fufu—fufufu... Paseri...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに仲間が増えるよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soon you’ll have more comrades...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 尻を並べて、たっぷり可愛がってやるよ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll line up side by side and lavishly spoil them...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねっとりとした思念をぶつけられて、身を竦ませ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hit by the slimy thoughts, she shrunk back...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パセリは、苦悩する子孫を悲しげに見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paseri looked sorrowfully at her suffering descendants.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、けっこう来たはずだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, we should have come quite a way by now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おいちびっ子。まだ先は長いのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey kiddo. Is it still a long way to go?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そろそろ着く。準備しておくがよい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...We're nearly there. Be prepared."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「準備？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Preparation?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……ランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックさんの契約って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About Magic-san's contract,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやって破棄すればいいんでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how should we go about breaking it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ。そんな事も分からんのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. You don’t even know that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……知らないんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You don't know, do you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Noisy!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリス！　カモンフェリスーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis! Come on, Felis!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしたの、っとと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong, whoa..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「出番だ、着いてこい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s your turn. Follow me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスは低い天井すれすれを飛んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis flew just below the low ceiling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに追随してきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: following Rance closely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「急いでるみたいだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You seem to be in a hurry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日の悪魔の話？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this about the demon from yesterday?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ。ハグレ悪魔とか言ってたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. You were talking about a stray demon, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の悪魔とどう違うんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How is it different from a normal demon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……大きい所では、変わらないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...In the main points, not much difference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の悪魔は、刈り取った魂を悪魔界の上司に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Normal demons harvest souls and submit them to their superiors in the demon world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 提出して、階級を上げて力を増すんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: raising their rank and increasing power, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんふん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm hmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハグレ悪魔は、契約して取った魂を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stray demons, on the other hand, take souls from contracts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま吸い取って自分の力にするの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: immediately absorb them and turn them into their own power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 独立採算で、勝手にやってるって事」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They operate independently, doing as they please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんか、その方が簡単そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Somehow, that sounds easier."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魂を力に変換する事自体、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The act of converting souls into power itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰でもできる訳じゃないの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn’t something just anyone can do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上級悪魔じゃないと、ハグレにはなれないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only high-ranking demons can become strays."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん……お前は？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... how about you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理よ。そんな力はないし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Impossible. I don’t have that kind of power...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 階級も、もうすっかり……だもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And my rank is already completely... gone."
